body.name: [2024 Upgrade] First Aid Kit,Survival Gear Outdoor Tactical Gear Set Military Grade Molle System for Camper Travel Hunting Hiking and Adventures（RED）
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 10 hrs 14 mins
features: ✔【 First Aid Kit Content】Not only medical supplies that meet family emergencies. Including bandages, sterilize supplies, dressings,israeli bandage edc. It also contains many outdoor survival equipment, such as tactical flashlight (no batteries),tactical knife,flint fire starter,10ft paracord bracelet with a compass, Whistle, emergency blanket and poncho.

✔【Compact and Portable】The overall dimension of the molle first aid kit is 8'' x 5'' x 6'' and weight only 2.2 lbs, it is an ideal portable size for adult. The backpack is designed with a professional molle structure for portability.Perfect for camping, hiking, traveling, hunting, fishing, boating, cycling, backpacking and other outdoor adventure sports.

✔【Durable and Strong First Aid Kit】 The outdoor survival kit is constructed with durable double-layer military 600D nylon, with fixing strap on the back, quick release velcro panel, adjustable quick release buckle, 2 D-rings, solid metal snap, and two zippers. It can be fixed on tactical belts, backpacks, and can also be used on motorcycles, trucks, anti-roll bars and other vehicles.

✔【Trauma First Aid Kit Use For 】 ✔Ideal for tactical medics, military, police, firefighter, EMT, hunter, first responders, hikers, campers, outdoor enthusiasts and more!✔Use for car, boat, bike, motorcycle, home, workplace; ✔Also suit for natural disasters survival emergency, such as earthquakes, hurricanes, tornados, floods and fires.

✔【Quality and Service】We commit to providing the most comprehensive customer service. If you meet any problem with this survival first aid kits, please feel free to contact us. We ensure that every customer's user experience is high above others.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: WHY US? At Homestock+, we live to create impressive design in first aid kit. In an emergency situation, being prepared means the difference between life and death. How well you’re prepared for an emergency today might just help someone stay alive tomorrow. Our kits can help you make that difference. Organized, Comprehensive, Compact. That’s what you really need it when you faced with an emergency. That’s what you are looking for and also what our kits are great about.

Compact and Portable With 8'' x 6'' x 5'' overall dimension, the kit weights only 2.2 lbs,compact size and easy to carry. Fully Laid Flat & Tri-folded Design The kit offers three large compartments and plenty of rooms to hold all the essential emergency supplies and survival tools. Removable MOLLE System With a removable velcro system, you can carry this kit on your tactical backpack or adhere it to your car seat. which made it a perfect companion for any outdoor activities. First Aid Guide The first aid guide will not only tell you the instructions for each item, but also tell you the steps to solve the harm we often encounter. Even if you are a novice, you can use our medical kits for survival without any difficulty.

The Emergency Thermal The fastest, safest, most effective prehospital field tourniquet,100% effective in occluding blood flow in both upper & lower extremities. Emergency Trauma Bandage(Israeli Bandage) Emergency trauma bandage is designed to stop bleeding from hemorrhagic wounds caused by traumatic injuries in a rapid, extremely effective, and easy way. Tactical Flashlight LED tactical flashlight - high lumen, 5 modes and zoomable.It is great for outdoor use Camping Gear and Accessories 15000 times reuse fire starter,multi-function paracord bracelet (compass, whistle) and survival whistle.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice first aid kit
reviews.reviewText: Bought this to throw in my motorcycle bag. Pretty nice setup, hopefully it don't get much use

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect addition to your backpack
reviews.reviewText: I make my husband take this little guy with him since he rides a motorcycle. It has everything he needs and isn’t too big. It doesn’t have labels like other medical kits I’ve bought, which means it might take longer to find something, but that’s expected with its compact size. I made sure to have the important stuff in the front and easily accessible

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I keep this in my car knowing that it has darn near every thing in it.It is light enough to strap on a pack when I go biking.Good Deal for the money

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 29, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice, compact emergency/survival pack
reviews.reviewText: First off, I received this bag in timely fashion. As you can see above, the back is roughly 8.5” in height, a little over 5.5” in width, and approximately 5.5” in depth. It is a great pack to carry on long trip and is extremely light. The bag has multiple compartments and if you take items out, you need to be able to recall how to repack them, as it can take a minute to repack if not. I’m not much of an outdoors man, but the pack is equipped with a knife, fire starter, first aid, tourniquets, and most of the required equipment to treat moderate injuries temporarily until help arrives. I am glad to have a pack like this for the times me and my family go on hikes and have some since of security I can provide them with the immediate care they need if some injury occurs.--

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Has a lot of good stuff in the bag
reviews.reviewText: Purchased 2 kits as a gift to my sons, one for his boat and one to take to his work site. They were impressed with all the stuff in the kit. The bag also has lots of different configurations to carry other items are to attach to different places..

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Its everything I knew it would be. I already own a fewOnly downside. I was sent the wrong color - what I got and what I ordered were not the same

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very cool first aid kit
reviews.reviewText: The first aid kit is loaded with fun gear. Very Tacti-cool. Nice pocket knife. Survival bracelet. Fire Starter. Nice bag with many strapping & Velcro options. Stick it to your dogs tactical Velcro vest and send him down to get Timmy from the well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Emergency first aid
reviews.reviewText: Great packaged, all needed for a emergency
